title: Disable Internet Identity admin UI and restrict admin access to username/password sessions

requirements.summary: Remove Internet Identity-based admin gating/UI and ensure admin routes rely only on the existing username/password admin session flow.
acceptanceCriteria: No admin page shows a prompt/button to "Login with Internet Identity" or any Internet Identity-based access gating.
Admin routes under /admin/* are accessible only after successful username/password login (via the existing admin session validation).

The /admin/access page is not reachable from the UI (remove it from admin navigation) and is not registered as a route, or it is replaced with an English message explaining it is unavailable because Internet Identity is disabled for admin auth.
All user-facing text related to this change is in English.

file_operations.description: Remove the /admin/access route registration and any related imports/usages (AdminAccessPage, OwnerOnlyRouteGuard) so the Internet Identity admin access UI is no longer reachable and no Internet Identity gating is shown within the admin area.
Delete the Internet Identity-based admin access management page to ensure no admin UI references Internet Identity for authentication/authorization.
Delete the owner-only guard that prompts "Login with Internet Identity" so no admin flows include Internet Identity prompts or access gating.
